title: The worst part about Fizz
body:
People say a lot of stuff about Fizz - but what's the worst part about him?
https://media.giphy.com/media/3oEjHBe9FG25sGar6g/giphy.gif

replies.body: i laughed half way in after i remember what he would say at the end but i expected a fizz photoshopped in tho
Not skilled enough for that, sadly...

My attempt
http://i.imgur.com/a2fdh3N.png
https://media.giphy.com/media/ihWcaj6R061wc/giphy.gif
I love that gif.
Me too bro xD
lol {{item:3048}} on fizz

> [{quoted}](name=maikokk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6EW1GU5P,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2016-07-16T23:54:57.027+0000)
>
> lol {{item:3048}} on fizz

If you can actually get one on Fizz it's freaking amazing. Can easily get him 120 AP if not more with lich bane and shit, the shield is godlike for when you're not invulnerable. If he actually has one stacked it means you're *really fucked.*

That's actually pretty interesting. I've began to use the tear and archangel's staff to get lots of AP and mana for a few of my champs (Viktor mainly), but I haven't tried it on Fizz just yet. I'll have to give it a shot.

> [{quoted}](name=SpikedFruitPunch,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6EW1GU5P,comment-id=000400000000000100010000,timestamp=2016-07-17T09:33:21.789+0000)
>
> That's actually pretty interesting. I've began to use the tear and archangel's staff to get lots of AP and mana for a few of my champs (Viktor mainly), but I haven't tried it on Fizz just yet. I'll have to give it a shot.

Go ahead, try it out. I'm not sure if it will be amazing on him, but I do know that it is better than Zhonya's in many ways. Less armor and cdr, but huge AP, huge mana, huge shield.
It indicates just how much he's farmed and just how screwed you are.

Rylai's crystal wang has emerged.

We are not prepared.
i love how the naked part is true.
As a Fizz main I can confirm I connect with Fizz by playing nude
